projectInfo.invalidCwdWarning: Unrecognized path format, please set the correct working directory manually
projectInfo.invalidCwdDescription: This project's path may be a placeholder format (e.g., generated by Gemini CLI). Please click the edit button above to set the correct working directory, so the system can properly identify the project location and enable Git-related features.

sync.allLatest: All sessions of "{{name}}" are up to date

import.title: Import Configuration
import.description: Import MCP service configurations from existing tools. Import will take over your original config files. Backups are created automatically and can be restored anytime from Hub.
import.conflictsDescription: The following services have configuration conflicts
import.conflictsStepDescription: Choose how to handle services with the same name
import.envDescription: Set environment variables required by services
import.envStepDescription: Set values for detected environment variables
import.envHint: Values will be encrypted. Leave empty to skip.
import.shadowModeDescription: When enabled, original config files will be replaced with Mantra Gateway entry point. Your existing configurations are safely imported to Mantra, and original files will be backed up to .mantra-backup.
import.confirmDescription: Import will take over your MCP configuration files. Backups are created automatically and can be restored anytime from Hub.
import.importingHint: Please do not close this dialog
import.takeoverHint: Original configs have been backed up. You can restore them anytime in Hub.
import.gatewayNotRunning: Gateway is not running. Start it for services to take effect.

takeover.restoreWillDo1: Restore backup content to original location

toolPolicy.title: Tool Policy
toolPolicy.descriptionGlobal: Configure default tool access permissions for {{service}}, applied to all projects

modeDescription.allow_all: Allow AI to call all tools from this service (except explicitly denied)
modeDescription.deny_all: Block AI from calling any tools from this service
modeDescription.custom: Only allow AI to call explicitly allowed tools

toolPolicy.noToolsHint: Click 'Refresh Tools' to fetch tools from the service
toolPolicy.noToolsCached: No cached tools, ensure the service is running
toolPolicy.globalHint: Editing the service's default policy. This will affect all projects without custom configuration.
toolPolicy.projectHint: Customizing policy for project {{project}}. This will override the global default.
toolPolicy.customActive: Using custom policy for this project

oauth.description: Configure OAuth 2.0 authentication for remote MCP services
oauth.bearerTokenPlaceholder: Enter your API token or use ${env:VAR_NAME} for environment variables
oauth.bearerTokenHint: Token will be stored securely. Use ${env:VAR_NAME} to reference environment variables.
oauth.browserOpened: Browser opened for authorization. Complete the login process.
oauth.refreshedDesc: Access token has been refreshed successfully
oauth.missingConfig: Please fill in all required fields (Client ID, Authorization URL, Token URL)
